caption.p: Latitude–pressure cross-sections of the DJF average of ( a–d) zonal mean temperature (°C) and ( e–h) zonal mean zonal wind (m s -1) response to ( a,e) weak, ( b,f) moderate, ( c,g) strong and ( d,h) very strong IPWP Niño, based on WACCM4 simulations (R1–5). Stippling indicates anomalies that are significant at the 95% confidence level (Student’s t-test).
